original_text: “This is what the Lord Almighty, the God of Israel, says: You sent letters in your own name to all the people in Jerusalem, to the priest Zephaniah son of Maaseiah, and to all the other priests. You said to Zephaniah,
korean_text: 만군의 여호와 이스라엘의 하나님께서 이와 같이 말씀하여 이르시되 네가 네 이름으로 예루살렘에 있는 모든 백성과 제사장 마아세야의 아들 스바냐와 모든 제사장에게 글을 보내 이르기를

sentences.original_text: This is what the Lord Almighty says
You sent letters in your own name
to all the people in Jerusalem
to the priest Zephaniah son of Maaseiah
and to all the other priests
